situation.title: Business trips abroad
situation.meta_description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic has launched a new free service that will help Czech companies with visas even where countries do not currently issue the necessary documents.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Measures for entrepreneurs and businessmen are different in every state. Therefore Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic has launched a new free service that will help Czech companies with visas even where countries do not currently issue the necessary documents. The service also helps with exceptions from mandatory quarantine for business trips abroad or the arrival of a key business partner from a country where it is not currently possible to travel to the Czech Republic.

Entrepreneurs can send questions and requests for help at obchodnicesty@mzv.cz. The request should include contact information for you and your key partners so that the Ministry can get in touch with them. By default, they should do so within 12 hours of receiving the inquiry.

Details on the assistance from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs can be found here.
